Cooldowns.Description: Cooldown times in milliseconds between reactions

PipeSettings.Description: Named pipe connection settings for MSAgent-AI communication

CustomPrompts.Description: You can customize these prompts in the source code (MSAgentGTAV.cs)

Examples.VehicleEntry: The player just entered a {vehicleType} called {vehicleName}{valueInfo}. React to this vehicle!
Examples.VehicleExit: The player just exited their vehicle. Comment on it.
Examples.WeatherChange: The weather changed to {weatherName}. Comment on the weather!
Examples.WantedLevel: The player now has {stars} wanted stars! React to the police chase!
Examples.WantedLevelCleared: The player escaped the police! Congratulate them!
Examples.PlayerDeath: The player just died! React to their death with sympathy or humor.
Examples.PlayerRespawn: The player respawned. Welcome them back.
Examples.CharacterSwitch: The player switched to {characterName}. React to this character!
Examples.LocationChange: The player entered {locationName}. Comment on this location!
Examples.TimeOfDay: It's now {timeDescription} in the game. Comment on the time!

VehicleValues.Description: Vehicle values are defined in InitializeVehicleValues() method
VehicleValues.Note: Add your own vehicle values by editing the MSAgentGTAV.cs source code
